    • sendBotReadyInfo

      public static void sendBotReadyInfo(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild)
      Parameters:
      guild - is server that something happened on. Sends info to a selected channel when it is ready. If you want to send a tag, you can add a member or role id.
      See Also:
      • Channels

    • sendWarnInfo

      public void sendWarnInfo(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild, net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.message.MessageReceivedEvent event, String smsg)
      Parameters:
      guild - is server that something happened on.
      event - is Message Received event.
      smsg - is message that already sent by member. This method will work when this message contains sensitive content.
      See Also:

    • sendJoinInfo

      public void sendJoinInfo(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.guild.member.GuildMemberJoinEvent event, net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild)
      Parameters:
      event - is member join event.
      guild - is server that event happened on. This method will work when someone joins a server, sends a welcome message that contains this member tag and server member count.

    • reactAdviceMessage

      public void reactAdviceMessage(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.message.MessageReceivedEvent e)
      Parameters:
      e - is a message event that received. This method will react to a message on selected channel.Useful for advice channels.

    • sendSlashReply

      public static void sendSlashReply(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.interaction.command.SlashCommandInteractionEvent event)
      Parameters:
      event - is slash command interaction event. Checks slash commands and send relevant respond.

    • showMemberCount

      public static void showMemberCount(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild)
      Parameters:
      guild - is server that something happened on. This method is to show total member count on a selected voice channel.
